transcript:
Your call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you are trying to reach is not available.
Hello?
Hello.
Hello.
Ah Mayank bhai chemical se baat kar rahe hain Mayank Kumar ji?
Hello?
Hello haan ji.
Ah Mayank ji main na Vijay Agarwal baat kar raha hun manager India Mart se baat kar raha hun sir main. 
Ye aapke jo account mein hai na Abhishek uska manager baat kar raha hun sir main.
Han han bataiye.
Bas abhi aapki baat hui hogi na Abhishek se sir.
Han. Wo matlab wohi bata raha tha ki sir aapko ki jo bulk ki order kuch miss ho gaye hain. To uske liye thoda sa aapko India Mart pe na actively service ko use karna hai sir aapko.
Kyunki kuch jo lead aapki bulk wali hoti hai na to usme aap actively focus karo sir kyunki wo sold out ho jati hai aapki leads. Abhishek ne aapko bataya bhi hoga.
Han.
To usko to jo aapne India Mart ka app download kar rakha hai na sir aapne?
Han.
To wo beech beech mein na refresh karke aap baaji ko check karte raha karo sir.
Sir main refresh karte rehta hun aap manoge nahi sir dekhna kam se kam. Ek din mein kam se kam refresh karke dekhta hi rehta hun.
Achcha to aap ye jo service use karte ho mobile se karte ho. Screenshot bhi bhej dunga. Sir aap thoda sa dekhna waha se kitni lead aati hai.
Han Abhishek ko aap bhej dena screenshot sir aur kya matlab aap abhi jo service use karte ho mobile se karte ho desktop se karte ho aap?
Mobile pe.
Mobile se karte ho?
Han. Theek hai sir jaise hi aapke paas baaji aati hai to notification bhi aapke paas turant aa jata hai. Theek hai to thoda sa us pe dhyan dijiye baki aap service jo hai wo aap achche se use kar rahe ho aisi koi baat nahi hai aur Abhishek ne bataya tha ki ek product aapka DDP ke karwa rahe hain jisme aap bidding karte hain.
Han.
Han.
Uski jo leads hai wo aani band ho jayengi bilkul aapke paas sir ab.
Thik hai.
Aur sir isme jo tender jo hote hain inme apply kaise karte hain? Thik hai aap matlab. Haan ji boliye.
Kya cheez?
Tender hote hain na inme apply kaise karenge?
Sir usme kya hota hai ki yaha pe tender ka option aata hai na aap view tender karoge na jaise baaji ki detail dikhti hai na waise hi aapko tender ki sir dikh jayegi fir baki aap usko google pe search karke ki kaun se government se nikla hai waha pe jaake aap better search kar sakte ho aap sir.
Sir jaise aap waha pe tender pe aap jaoge waha pe contact now karoge na to bas waha pe ek information dikh jayegi sir aapko ki ye tender kaha se publish hua hua hai.
Han han wo dikhta hai isliye file khulti hai.
Han to fir aap usko google pe aap search karna to wo aapko waha pe unki website pe le jayega waha pe sari information mil jayegi sir aapko.
Thik hai sir.
Thik hai hello baki Abhishek han ji sir.
Han sir isme kuch documents wagera bhi dene padte hain kya matlab kya procedure rehta hai iska wo jata sara tender ka. Sir tender ka waha pe wo hota hai ki wo bidding wagera option hota hai waha pe uska pehle payment karna padta hai waha pe likha hota hai ki tender ki last date kab kab tak hai thik hai ye tender bharne ke liye minimum amount kitna deposit karna padega kaun kaun se document lagenge wo information sari waha pe mention hoti hai sir.
Achcha wo amount matlab humko deposit karna hota hai usme. Haan amount deposit karna hota hai aapko tabhi aap aage uski meeting ke liye aap ja sakte ho aap bidding ke liye.
Achcha wo achcha bidding hoti hai bidding ke liye amount deposit karna hota hai. Bilkul sahi baat han ji sir.
Achcha achcha achcha.
To fir wo document wagera mangte hain aapse. Sir man ke chaliye isme agar hamara tender mein wo aa jata hai naam fir uske baad sir aisa to nahi hai kahi wo fir. Scam ho jaye ya fir matlab.
Nahi nahi sir tender government ka hota hai aisi baat nahi hai. Baki jo bhi aapke waha pe tender pass hone ke baad jo bhi term and condition hoti hai wo sab written mein hoti hai aapke paas government ki taraf se. Achcha achcha achcha ya jaha se wo tender publish hua hai jis company se sir.
Achcha achcha.
Han.
Thik hai sir. Ye rehta hai. Baki Abhishek hai yaha pe koi bhi support chahiye kabhi bhi aap usko call kar lijiye sir.
Ji ji okay sir. Thik hai ji.
Ji ji ji. Okay sir right thank you. Thik hai sir. Okay.
Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer inquired about tender application process.

- Customer worried about potential tender scams.



Resolution:

- Explained how to find tender details online.

- Clarified tender process and document requirements.

- Reassured about government tender legitimacy.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- tender, application, bidding, documents, leads
